CustomField.description: This date is used as a Loan Start Date to generate the repayment schedule. The user can fill this field at the beginning of the loan to project when loan is disbursed; but this field can be updated anytime before disbursement.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This date is used as a Loan Start Date to generate the repayment schedule. The user can fill this field at the beginning of the loan to project when loan is disbursed; but this field can be updated anytime before disbursement.
CustomField.label: Contract Date
